WebLink.description: Uses Contract LWC to edit contract details
WebLink.url: /lightning/cmp/c__APT_ContractServiceDetailsWrapper?c__existingContractId={!Apttus__APTS_Agreement__c.Id}&c__currentStatus={!Apttus__APTS_Agreement__c.Apttus__Status__c}&c__isAmend={!IF ((ISPICKVAL( Apttus__APTS_Agreement__c.APT_Contract_Type__c , 'DoV Contract')), true, false)}&c__isRenew={!IF ((ISPICKVAL( Apttus__APTS_Agreement__c.APT_Contract_Type__c , 'Renewal Contract')), true, false)}
